DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of FFR (Fractional flow reserve) guided Percutaneous Coronary Intervention in coronary tandem lesions.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of FFR Guided Percutaneous Coronary Intervention in Coronary Tandem Lesions
DOC.criteria: Tandem lesion evaluated by FFR Written consent TIMI flow 〈 3 Grafted vessel Left ventricular ejection fraction 〈 30% Severe calcification and/or severe tortuosity Uncontrolled coronary spasm Life expectancy 〈 2 years Planned high risk surgery Pregnancy or breastfeeding
